Description: Content that attacks people based on their race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, or serious disease.
Content that depicts violence, gore, or graphic images, including but not limited to images of dead bodies, gore, or violent acts.
Content that depicts nudity, sex, or explicit material, including but not limited to images, videos, or text.
Content that is spam, misleading, or deceptive, including but not limited to fake or manipulated images, videos, or text.
Content that infringes on copyright, trademarks, or intellectual property rights, including unauthorized use of copyrighted images, videos, or text.
